body.content:
This is to notify you that your EMAIL ADDRESS have won a prize of
£10,200,000.00 (Great British Pounds Sterling), equivalent to:
$14,1 Milion United States Dollars from WhatsApp Awareness Lottery recently drawn here in UK in conjunction with the UK,
Greece and Japanese Lottery Commissions.
For claims and payment, please forward the followings to:  +30 699 635 3015 (WhatsApp only).
1: Your full name
2: Full address
3: Age
4:Sex/Gender
5: Marital status
6: Profession/Job
7: Winning Ticket Number
8: Serial number
9: Your WhatsApp number
10: Have you won a lottery before?
11: Amount won
12: Your email address (winners email address id only)
Upon receipt of these details, 1 to 12 as mentioned above on our WhatsApp number: +30 699 635 3015, we shall raise a cheque of £10.2 Million on your behalf.
Yours faithfully ,
Mrs Katerina Veshi,
Secretary, WhatsApp Lottery,Greece.
IMPORTANT POINTS:
1: Your details (1 to 12) must be sent to our WhatsApp number +30 699 635 3015 ). Note, this is a WhatsApp Awareness lottery
and all processes of payment must go through our WhatsApp number only as provided here and in a situation you don't have an existing WhatsApp number please we advice you sign up to one now and avail us with the number.

Note: any reply to our email address is a complete WASTE .

2: Winning Ticket No: WHSP/CV/0122/2020/21

3: Serial No: WHPLT/CV19/20/21.

4: Amount won: GBP10.2 Million

5: Our contact numbers are : +30 699 635 3015 (WhatsApp only) and +44 745 205 8058 call and sms only

Every communication for clam and payment must go through +30 699 635 3015 (WhatsApp) for a hitch free transaction.
